page.title: 20Early Morning before School
page.content:
I get up in the morning, go to the bathroom to wash, I wash my face, and clean my teeth,and after that I go to my bedroom to get dressed, when I go down stairs I make my sandwiches (if they're not already done the night before) sometimes I have breakfast if I feel like it .When I've time I make a cup of tea.When Dad comes down he gets his sandwiches out of the fridge and makes tea to go in his flask, puts it in his bag and we go up to the car .When we arrive at school, I get out , take my coat and bag and I am ready for lessons to begin.
Talitha Hatcher Aged 10 years.
